message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you at a price of $14000. This special offer is available for a limited time only, so please let me know if you are interested in securing this exceptional deal. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response.
